title: Drawing, "Decorative Study; Verso: Anatomical Study", 1814–18
medium: Pen and ink over graphite on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Three capitals, fountain; facade of church from the 14th century. 15th century portal. Verso: barbarian head in profile and head of young man in profile with mantel after antique.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Decorative Study; Verso: Anatomical Study", 1814–18.
1814–18. Pen and ink over graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2589.
